plays.text: Penalty to Tim Taylor 2 minutes for Crosschecking Eric Boulton
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Holding Fredrik Modin
Goal scored by Vaclav Prospal assisted by Vincent Lecavalier
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for Tripping Brad Richards
Goal scored by Dave Andreychuk assisted by Vaclav Prospal and Brad Richards
Goal scored by Daniel Briere unassisted
Penalty to Martin St. Louis 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Maxim Afinogenov
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Roughing Pavel Kubina
Penalty to Stan Neckar 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Jochen Hecht
Goal scored by Brad Richards assisted by Martin St. Louis and Cory Sarich
Goal scored by Taylor Pyatt assisted by Brian Campbell and Rhett Warrener
Penalty to Brad Lukowich 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Lukowich
Penalty to Maxim Afinogenov 2 minutes for Slashing Ben Clymer
Penalty to Fredrik Modin 2 minutes for High Sticking Maxim Afinogenov
Goal scored by Vaclav Prospal unassisted
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Adam Mair
